content: Met with my mentor, Alex. He gave me some invaluable insights into risk management. Feeling more prepared to tackle market volatility.
Joined a workshop on AI in finance. The future of trading looks incredibly exciting. Networking with some sharp minds.
Just finished a two-day hackathon at the firm. Our team developed a preliminary model for market prediction. It's rough, but it's a start.
Got some feedback on our hackathon project. Lots to refine, but the potential is there. Going to spend the next few days tweaking the algorithm.
Had a heart-to-heart with my parents over dinner. They're proud of what I'm doing but reminded me to take care of myself. Balance is key.
Set up a meeting with a potential collaborator from the AI workshop. Could be a big opportunity for the firm and my career.
Just turned 22. Reflecting on where I am versus where I thought I'd be. Grateful for the journey, excited for what's next.
Spent the day optimizing our AI model. It's not just about the numbers; it's about understanding the market's heartbeat.
Reconnecting with an old friend from college. It's amazing how our paths have diverged yet still intersect in meaningful ways.
Had a breakthrough with the AI model. It's now predicting with 5% better accuracy than before. Small steps, big impact.
Took a break from coding to explore Central Park. Sometimes, you need to step back to see the bigger picture.
After some setbacks, I'm learning that disciplined risk management isn't just a strategy—it's a mindset. Adjusting my approach.
Just wrapped up a three-day session with our tech team. We're integrating machine learning into our trading platform. It's happening.
The AI model is now live in our test environment. It's not perfect, but it's a testament to the progress we've made. Here's to continuous improvement.
Mentor Alex invited me to a high-level strategy meeting. My hard work is paying off. Time to step up my game.
